titleStmt.title: Joannis Scoti Erigenæ de divisione naturæ libri quinque, div desiderati / accedit appendix ex ambiguis S. Maximi Græce & Latine.
titleStmt.author: Erigena, Johannes Scotus, ca. 810-ca. 877.
Maximus, Confessor, Saint, ca. 580-662. Scholia in Gregorium Theologum.

notesStmt.note: The appendix has separate t.p. and is in two columns per page with facing Greek and Latin.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
